Object Shape: Blimp, Circle, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
Summary: Bright oval light that changed shape and slowly faded away.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in La Mirada
There were no other sightings in La Mirada on or around January 2nd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking at the sunset and saw something that looked like it could be a cloud reflecting light from the sun but this was extremely smooth. As I was observing it it started to change shape, or rather it extended. Off the left side it seemed to grow longer. After about 5 minutes the part that grew started to retract back in. After it retracted back in it just turned into a bright ball of light. Within 5 minutes it dwindled down to nothing and disappeared. (In the pictures im submitting, the object is to the very left of the palm trees. This photo is from my phone so its not the greatest quality but you will see the ball of light I observed. Feel free to contact me for any info)
